item.title: Order of the Engineer Registration | Sept. 22
item.description: Date: Monday, September 22, 2025 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM - The Order of the Engineer is open to all senior and graduate engineering students. The Order is a national organization that fosters a spirit of pride and responsibility in the engineering profession. The ceremony will be held October 15th at 6:00 PM. You must attend to be inducted and receive your ring. To register, https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSey-EadwWdy79LqItirOHymANzIu8tYSu8ahXu1eTuNqm7McA/viewform?usp=header

item.title: 2025-26 Student Advisory Council (SAC) - Application deadline September 24
item.description: Wednesday, September 24, 2025 8:00 AM - 7:00 PM - Applications are now open for the 2025–26 Student Advisory Council (SAC)! Hosted by Vice Provosts Dr. Rob Hradsky and Dr. Matt Oehlschlaeger, the SAC connects students with campus leadership to shape academics, student life, and RPI culture. Meetings are biweekly on Fridays, 12–1:30 PM. Apply by Sept. 24 to make your voice heard and create positive change. Questions? Contact Quadir “Q” Webster at webstq@rpi.edu.

item.title: Counseling Center Announces Drop-in Counseling Hours for Fall 2025
item.description: The RPI Counseling Center invites students to meet with a counselor without a formal appointment, during designated drop-in hours. There are two hours available for walk-in each day (M/F - 10 a.m. to 12 p.m.; T/W/Th - 2 to 4 p.m.). Drop-in counseling is available on a first come, first served basis on days when classes are in session. Students who cannot attend drop-in times can call (518) 276-6479 to schedule an appointment.

item.title: Counseling Center Announces Support Group for International Graduate Students
item.description: The Counseling Center invites International Graduate students to participate in a new drop-in therapeutic support group. Bi-weekly sessions begin on September 8th, 5:30 p.m. to 6:30 p.m. at the ISSS office. These meetings are free and confidential and offer the opportunity to connect with others, share common struggles, and learn skills for success.

item.description: Date: Wednesday, September 24, 2025 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM - The National Defense Science and Engineering Graduate Fellowship provides 3 years of tuition and salary for PhD students in STEM fields. item.title: Mercer XLab Fall 2025 Schedule and Information Directory
item.description: The Mercer XLab is NOW open 8 a.m. - 8 p.m. on weekdays during the Fall 2025 semester. All RPI students are welcome to learn from our Mercer X Student Workers! They can help you design your project, print your first PCB, learn how to solder, borrow electronic parts and instrumentation, and more. Come try Analog Devices Inc.’s new devices intended for “AI on the edge,” where small microcontrollers run your AI for image recognition and speech detection. We’ll see you soon on the JEC 6th floor!

item.title: Did you know that a quarter of staff vacancies are filled by current employees?
item.description: Did you know that nearly 1 in 4 of the posted staff vacancies at RPI are filled by current RPI employees? Ever wonder if you could be next? Competing for a vacancy is an effective way to learn more about other jobs on campus and has the added benefit of giving hiring managers the chance to learn more about your career aspirations, your talents, and your contributions.
